ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF(OR(Walkin_Apply_Unregistered_ChannelPartner__c,!ISBLANK(Walkin_Channel_Partner__c)),!ISPICKVAL(Walkin_Source__c,"Channel Partner"),false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Walkin Broker Details were filled only on Channel Partner Walkin Source
